Class Guards

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.event.EventCard
      • javelin.controller.event.urban.UrbanEvent
        • javelin.controller.event.urban.encounter.UrbanEncounter
          • javelin.controller.event.urban.encounter.Guards
  • public class Guards
extends UrbanEncounter
    Squad gets arrested by guards. They can fight, bribe or talk their way out of the situation. If they fail, they will spend some time in jail.
